CustomField.description: Foreman's first and last name(This field was created for NPL MA).
CustomField.formula: IF( Foreman__r.MiddleName <> NULL, Foreman__r.FirstName & " " & Foreman__r.MiddleName & " " & Foreman__r.LastName, Foreman__r.FirstName & " " & Foreman__r.LastName)
CustomField.label: Foreman Name
